name: Mass Effect Pack
white_cards: Bone-shattering sex with a metal woman.
Falling I actual love with a video game character.
My complicated backstory that you will soon learn about.
Running a few errands before saving the galaxy.

black_cards.text: Coming this spring from BioWare, Mass Effect: _____.
I'm Commander Shepard, and this is my favorite place for _____ on the Citadel.
It turns out the Reapers didn't want to destroy the galaxy. They just wanted _____.
We were the two best hand-to-hand combatants on the ship. I had reach, but she had _____.
